pcs_sub_heading: Would you like to join this conversation?
nbt_random_calls_description: Here you have the chance to directly talk to random language learners.  - the only information they will see about you is your first name. Everything else depends on you. Consider it like talking to a stranger on the street - you may just talk out of curiosity or to  help the other person. If you feel like it though, you may add the other person as your conversation partner during or after the call. Enjoy!

section_title.time_commitment: How much time does Little World require?
section_title.data_tech_issues: What happens to my data and in the event of technical faults?

q1.question: Why Little World?
q1.answer: The integration of immigrants is greatly facilitated through the acquisition of German language skills. However, a significant number of refugees and newcomers face barriers in accessing language learning opportunities, exacerbated by the current COVID-19 situation. Little World offers a comprehensive solution by facilitating language learning through its platform, fostering connections across communities and promoting social inclusion and equal opportunities.

q2.question: Isn't it possible for language learners to engage in language tandem learning opportunities
q2.answer: Tandem learning partnerships can be highly beneficial. However, it is often the case that individuals are primarily interested in acquiring proficiency in widely spoken languages such as English, Spanish, or French. Conversely, a vast majority of immigrants to Germany bring non-mainstream languages such as Hindi, Ukrainian, or Amharic, making it challenging to find suitable tandem partners. Little World addresses this issue by providing a platform where individuals can connect and engage in German language practice.

q3.question: What about language teachers or language schools?
q3.answer: While traditional language courses are highly recommended, they are often plagued by lengthy waiting periods or prohibitive costs for self-funded immigrants. These courses may offer academic instruction, but lack the essential component of practical language usage through speaking with native speakers. Little World offers a practical solution to this challenge, providing a platform for language practice with native German speakers

q1.question: Is Little World really free of charge?
q1.answer: Yes :) For each and everyone, forever!

q2.question: Can I just give it a try?
q2.answer: Definitely! You can easily create an account within a matter of minutes, select your interests, and start chatting!

q3.question: Is it only possible to help if I speak German?
q3.answer: Yes, Little World provides an opportunity to practice speaking German, therefore, active participation in speaking the language is the optimal approach

q4.question: And what if we can't think of a topic to talk about?
q4.answer: In addition to language practice, there are always topics like weather, penguins, or pizza to discuss. If you find yourself needing additional support, Little World has provided various tools on the platform to enhance conversation -try it out right now!

q5.question: Is there also an app?
q5.answer: Little World is a web-based application, accessible directly through your internet browser without the need for a separate download from an app store. However, plans for a mobile application are in the works and will be made available in the near future

q1.question: An honorary post. I don't have the time for that, do I?
q1.answer: Little World provides a flexible and accommodating volunteer service that can easily be integrated into your daily routine. The program offers complete autonomy in terms of how and when you can participate, and even a small commitment of 30 minutes a week can have a significant positive impact on others

q2.question: Can I also skip a week?
q2.answer: Certainly, we understand that everyone has prior commitments and obligations in their daily lives. If the volunteer service does not align with your schedule, you have the option to cancel the appointment at any time. Little World values flexibility and allows you to choose the time that works best for you.

q1.question: How long do the contacts last?
q1.answer: The duration of the conversation can vary: some individuals maintain contact for several months, others for years, and in some cases, even celebrate holidays together. Our team strives to match you with a compatible conversation partner, however, if for any reason the connection does not work out, it is not a problem. We are always ready to provide you with new and pleasant individuals to engage in conversation with.

q2.question: How are you financed?
q2.answer: So far, Little World has been sustained through personal funds and small grants. In the mid-term, our goal is to secure funding from local government entities and the federal government, as we cannot solely rely on existing resources. Our objective is to continue providing free access to all participants, with a specific emphasis on supporting socially disadvantaged individuals and refugees.

q1.question: What happens to my data?
q1.answer: At Little World, we place a high value on data protection and transparency. For this reason, we have transparently disclosed all relevant information in our privacy policy, which can be accessed at ttps://home.little-world.com/datenschutz

q2.question: Can I remain anonymous?
q2.answer: Only your first name is displayed in our web application, visible only to your matches. Other personal details, such as your email address, are kept confidential and known only to our team. The user form, which can be accessed and customized at any time under the "Settings" tab, contains all relevant information.

q3.question: Technical faults on Little World?
q3.answer: For technical issues, kindly utilize our contact form at https://home.little-world.com/contact and our support team will promptly attend to your concerns.

q4.question: I can't log in or register?
q4.answer: his can be frustrating, but don't worry! If you are having trouble receiving the registration email, please reach out to our support team using our contact form at: https://home.little-world.com/kontakt. We will be happy to assist you and resolve any technical issues you may be facing.
